bike.description: Reynolds 520 chromoly main tubes and stays, reinforced head tube collars, gusseted down tube, forged dropouts

components.description: Rock Shox XC32 TK, Solo Air spring, external rebound, TurnKey lockout adjust, 32mm stanchions, aluminum steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit MX, Alloy cups, ACB bearings
WTB Speed Disc i19 29" double-wall eyeleted disc-specific rims, Formula Hi-Lo flange sealed bearing 6-bolt disc hubs, 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Deore Shadow rear and Deore front
Shimano M445 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear RT56 rotors
Ritchey Mtn Comp 2X flat bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE x 720mm x +/- 5mm rise
Ritchey 2-bolt, 27.2 x 350mm, with alloy QR clamp
